author: srimanob
body:
#### PR description:
As reported in SIM meeting news (25 March), https://indico.cern.ch/event/1143277/, FastSim cmsDriver does not work. This PR is to handle Run-3 FastSim workflow.
- The main issue comes from the interplay between `run3_common` and `fastSim` modifiers. This is fix.

Still to look at (maybe at the later PR):
- It is not clear we should exclude GEM also as we did for Run-2. I just create FastSim era in the same way as Run_2 by excluding it. It may not need to exclude anymore.
- Workflows are added in the same style as 2018. Should we move to upgrade workflow?

Issue:
- Currently, Workflows run upto PAT. However, the validation, dqm and harvesting are not yet done for miniaod. 
- Nano does not work yet.

#### PR validation:
Configs from following runTheMatrix run until the end.
`runTheMatrix.py --what standard -l 2021.1,2021.8 -t 8 --wm init`

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:
Not a backport and no need of backport
title: Run-3 FastSim
